snippet: The children drowned after a rubber dinghy carrying migrants to Greece sank off Turkey’s Aegean coast on Tuesday, the state-run news agency reported.
abstract: Six Afghan migrant children drown off coast of Turkey; rescuers save five other migrants and are searching for two others who are reported missing.
lead_paragraph: The children drowned after a rubber dinghy carrying migrants to Greece sank off Turkey’s Aegean coast on Tuesday, the state-run news agency reported.

headline.main: 6 Afghan Children Die as Migrant Dinghy Sinks Off Turkey
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Turkey: 6 Migrant Children Drown

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
